channel.title: RuneRefliction - updated
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/717/runerefliction.png/][IMG]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/5153/runerefliction.png[/img][/URL]
[i]I was inspired to use this base when I was flicking through videos on YouTube. I liked the packaging and networking. I'm creating this just for programming purposes, I don't intend to finish it, create a re-make or add higher content. I've had a break lately so there hasn't been much done, but now that I'm back I will be updating Rune Refliction a lot more frequently, hopefully achieving the highest possible outcome. So anyway have a look through and enjoy.[/i]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/802/54748655.png/][IMG]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/9052/54748655.png[/img][/URL]
[font=verdana]Started shortcuts New report system (actually writes to a file now) New Travelling system Most npcs added Clipped following New clan chat system Started on most objects used Fixed switching - a lot smoother and faster Added a fully working gliding system Just finished the new Membership system, works beautifully Created a PathFinder system[/font] Fully working boat system - all boats work Ring of Duelling and glory works Spirit trees all work Fully working skillcapes - can't move whilst emote is active Random events Treasure trails Drop party system Clipped npcs
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/11/miniga.png/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/633/miniga.png[/img][/URL]
Pyramid plunder added - 4 working floors, receive sceptre's and statues. Occasional anti-poisons collected and a one minute timer Fully working Pest control; all monsters, real timers and portals work Tzhaar fight pits; correct countdown and winners Tzhaar fight caves; 63 waves Warriors guild; animated armours and defenders from cyclops's Barrows; all barrows bosses with digging and the correct tunnel for rewards Duel arena; all features working Fishing trawler; basic shop and timer
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/215/skillsba.png/][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/3900/skillsba.png[/img][/URL]
Clipped firemaking + all logs works including different coloured logs Woodcutting fully working, with stumps and birdnests Mining fully working with ores dissapearing Fully working herblore with all levels and ingredients working Cooking; every food-type cook-able and burning Agility fully working with every location; including barbarian assault Runecrafting working with talisman locating Crafting fully working; all leathers and bars Thieving with working with random events Fletching; every single log in the database (cut-able) Fishing; all fish fish-able Farming; all seeds farm-able
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIozapiq7uE[/youtube]

item.title: RuneRefliction - updated
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:63, topic:410696”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=511971.msg3883096#msg3883096 date=1326216002]
I’ve noticed that many servers still don’t have it so when you click an object from a distance, it activates the clicked object at the correct distance. It’s a shame, considering how easy this is to implement.
[/quote]

[code]c.clickObjectType = 0;
c.clickNpcType = 0;[/code][/quote]

He means more like using an event to check if you are close enough to the object.
So that you click the object and you walk all the way towards it before doing the action.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneRefliction - updated
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Team_Rocket:

I’ve noticed that many servers still don’t have it so when you click an object from a distance, it activates the clicked object at the correct distance. It’s a shame, considering how easy this is to implement.

[code]c.clickObjectType = 0;
c.clickNpcType = 0;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: RuneRefliction - updated
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:58, topic:410696”][quote author=Int Bauk link=topic=511971.msg3853570#msg3853570 date=1324202357]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=511971.msg3853153#msg3853153 date=1324175857]

Clips every tile, manually.

Height levels are like 50%.

clips every tile meaning that they move 1 tile at a time?
[/quote]sounds like he added the old laggy tile clipping…

No, it’s not laggy at all, because there’s no big loop.

and it’s not a tile a time.
[/quote]when server comes out I will be the tester of that If you have a bunch of tiles listed in a file…then it will be uber laggy.[/quote]

i be sure dad

Read full topic

Just added Gnome Glider and Spirit Tree travelling, will post videos soon.

Holy shit, i’m sensing near perfect rsps remake.

someone makes 5% of a rs remake
NO WAI THER GUNN B PERFECTZ

and u bring up a post i made over 4 months ago why?
[/quote]
Because it’s still an active topic, and therefore anything said is still up for debate.

Anyway the remake looks nice so far. Goodluck[/quote]

still doesn’t matter. and that post was not for debate.

Read full topic
